pageContext.claim: “Last time I went to Davos, the Fake News said I should not go there. This year, because of the Shutdown, I decided not to go, and the Fake News said I should be there. The fact is that the people understand the media better than the media understands them!”
pageContext.analysis: This is a huge exaggeration in both respects. Trump is hardly criticized for his decisions to skip or attend the World Economic Forum in Switzerland.
